00001 /* Demo Note:  This demo uses a FileProgress class that handles the UI for displaying the file name and percent complete.
00002 The FileProgress class is not part of SWFUpload.
00003 */
00004 
00005 
00006 /* **********************
00007    Event Handlers
00008    These are my custom event handlers to make my
00009    web application behave the way I went when SWFUpload
00010    completes different tasks.  These aren't part of the SWFUpload
00011    package.  They are part of my application.  Without these none
00012    of the actions SWFUpload makes will show up in my application.
00013    ********************** */
00014 function fileQueued(file) {
00015       try {
00016             var progress = new FileProgress(file, this.customSettings.progressTarget);
00017             progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "pending" ) );
00018             progress.toggleCancel(true, this);
00019 
00020       } catch (ex) {
00021             this.debug(ex);
00022       }
00023 
00024 }
00025 
00026 function fileQueueError(file, errorCode, message) {
00027       try {
00028             if (errorCode === SWFUpload.QUEUE_ERROR.QUEUE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED) {
00029                   alert("You have attempted to queue too many files.\n" + (message === 0 ? "You have reached the upload limit." : "You may select " + (message > 1 ? "up to " + message + " files." : "one file.")));
00030                   return;
00031             }
00032 
00033             var progress = new FileProgress(file, this.customSettings.progressTarget);
00034             progress.setError();
00035             progress.toggleCancel(false);
00036 
00037             switch (errorCode) {
00038             case SWFUpload.QUEUE_ERROR.FILE_EXCEEDS_SIZE_LIMIT:
00039                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "file_is_too_big" ));
00040                   this.debug("Error Code: File too big, File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00041                   break;
00042             case SWFUpload.QUEUE_ERROR.ZERO_BYTE_FILE:
00043                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "cannot_upload_zero_bytes" ) );
00044                   this.debug("Error Code: Zero byte file, File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00045                   break;
00046             case SWFUpload.QUEUE_ERROR.INVALID_FILETYPE:
00047                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "invalid_file_type" ) );
00048                   this.debug("Error Code: Invalid File Type, File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00049                   break;
00050             default:
00051                   if (file !== null) {
00052                         progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "unhandled_error" ) );
00053                   }
00054                   this.debug("Error Code: " + errorCode + ", File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00055                   break;
00056             }
00057       } catch (ex) {
00058         this.debug(ex);
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062 function fileDialogComplete(numFilesSelected, numFilesQueued) {
00063       try {
00064             if (numFilesSelected > 0) {
00065                   document.getElementById(this.customSettings.cancelButtonId).disabled = false;
00066             }
00067             
00068             /* I want auto start the upload and I can do that here */
00069             this.startUpload();
00070       } catch (ex)  {
00071         this.debug(ex);
00072       }
00073 }
00074 
00075 function uploadStart(file) {
00076       try {
00077             /* I don't want to do any file validation or anything,  I'll just update the UI and
00078             return true to indicate that the upload should start.
00079             It's important to update the UI here because in Linux no uploadProgress events are called. The best
00080             we can do is say we are uploading.
00081              */
00082             var progress = new FileProgress(file, this.customSettings.progressTarget);
00083             progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( 'uploading' ) );
00084             progress.toggleCancel(true, this);
00085       }
00086       catch (ex) {}
00087       
00088       return true;
00089 }
00090 
00091 function uploadProgress(file, bytesLoaded, bytesTotal) {
00092       try {
00093             var percent = Math.ceil((bytesLoaded / bytesTotal) * 100);
00094 
00095             var progress = new FileProgress(file, this.customSettings.progressTarget);
00096             progress.setProgress(percent);
00097             progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( 'uploading' ) );
00098       } catch (ex) {
00099             this.debug(ex);
00100       }
00101 }
00102 
00103 function uploadSuccess(file, serverData) {
00104       try {
00105             var progress = new FileProgress(file, this.customSettings.progressTarget);
00106             progress.setComplete();
00107             progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( 'complete' ) );
00108             progress.toggleCancel(false);
00109 
00110       } catch (ex) {
00111             this.debug(ex);
00112       }
00113 }
00114 
00115 function uploadError(file, errorCode, message) {
00116       try {
00117             var progress = new FileProgress(file, this.customSettings.progressTarget);
00118             progress.setError();
00119             progress.toggleCancel(false);
00120 
00121             switch (errorCode) {
00122             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.HTTP_ERROR:
00123                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "upload_error" ) + message );
00124                   this.debug("Error Code: HTTP Error, File name: " + file.name + ", Message: " + message);
00125                   break;
00126             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.UPLOAD_FAILED:
00127                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "upload_failed" ) );
00128                   this.debug("Error Code: Upload Failed, File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00129                   break;
00130             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.IO_ERROR:
00131                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "server_io_error" ) ) ;
00132                   this.debug("Error Code: IO Error, File name: " + file.name + ", Message: " + message);
00133                   break;
00134             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.SECURITY_ERROR:
00135                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "security_error" ) );
00136                   this.debug("Error Code: Security Error, File name: " + file.name + ", Message: " + message);
00137                   break;
00138             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.UPLOAD_LIMIT_EXCEEDED:
00139                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "upload_limit" ) );
00140                   this.debug("Error Code: Upload Limit Exceeded, File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00141                   break;
00142             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.FILE_VALIDATION_FAILED:
00143                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "failed_validation" ) );
00144                   this.debug("Error Code: File Validation Failed, File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00145                   break;
00146             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.FILE_CANCELLED:
00147                   /* If there aren't any files left (they were all cancelled) disable the cancel button */
00148                   if (this.getStats().files_queued === 0) {
00149                         document.getElementById(this.customSettings.cancelButtonId).disabled = true;
00150                   }
00151                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "cancelled" ) );
00152                   progress.setCancelled();
00153                   break;
00154             case SWFUpload.UPLOAD_ERROR.UPLOAD_STOPPED:
00155                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "stopped" ) );
00156                   break;
00157             default:
00158                   progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( "unhandled_error" ) + ": " + errorCode);
00159                   this.debug("Error Code: " + errorCode + ", File name: " + file.name + ", File size: " + file.size + ", Message: " + message);
00160                   break;
00161             }
00162       } catch (ex) {
00163         this.debug(ex);
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 function uploadComplete(file) {
00168       if (this.getStats().files_queued === 0) {
00169             document.getElementById(this.customSettings.cancelButtonId).disabled = true;
00170       }
00171 }

00173 /* This event comes from the Queue Plugin */
00174 function queueComplete(numFilesUploaded) {
00175       var status = document.getElementById("divStatus");
00176       status.innerHTML = numFilesUploaded + " file" + (numFilesUploaded === 1 ? "" : "s") + " uploaded.";
00177 }
